author: Gurashish
title: Seating arrangement
question: I am still confused with seating arrangements for exam tomorrow my last name is singh and I am in section 203 so can anyone tell where I am supposed to sit for tomorrow’s exam
instructor_answer:
From: http://cs110.students.cs.ubc.ca/exam-instructions.html
CPSC 110 203
ANGU 098: Last names starting with Abb-Fu
BIOL 1000: Last names starting with Gal-Leu
PHRM 1101: Last names starting with Li-Pu
PHRM 1201: Last names starting with Qia-Tsu   <- you are here.
SWNG 221: Last names starting with Vah-Zho
